curam.util.resources
Interface EnvironmentConstants.Environment

Enclosing interface:
EnvironmentConstants
public static interface EnvironmentConstants.Environment

These settings configure the environment for your Curam application.

Field Detail

kAppServerVendor

static final java.lang.String kAppServerVendor
Suggested: Should be set to BEA or IBM to reflect the Application Server which is being used. If running outside an application server this should be empty. Defines the Application Server in which Curam will be deployed. This is setup automatically when the EAR file is built using the build targets. Property name : curam.environment.as.vendor

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kTnameservePort

static final java.lang.String kTnameservePort
Suggested: 900. Port on which the tnameserv is running. Property name : curam.environment.tnameserv.port

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kBindingsLocation

static final java.lang.String kBindingsLocation
Suggested: C:/Temp. Name of the file system location containing data sources. Property name : curam.environment.bindings.location

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kDefaultDateFormat

static final java.lang.String kDefaultDateFormat
Default: yyyy MM dd. The date format. Can be set to one of: "d M yyyy", "M d yyyy", "yyyy M d", "dd MM yyyy", "MM dd yyyy", "yyyy MM dd", "d MMM yyyy", "MMM d yyyy", "yyyy MMM d", "d MMM yyyy", "MMMM d yyyy", "yyyy MMMM d", "dd MMM yyyy", "MMM dd yyyy", "yyyy MMM dd". Property name : curam.environment.default.dateformat

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kDefaultDateSeparator

static final java.lang.String kDefaultDateSeparator
The date separator. Can be set to one of: ".", ",", "/", "-". Property name : curam.environment.default.dateseparator

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kDisableDynamicProperties

static final java.lang.String kDisableDynamicProperties
Indicates if dynamic properties should be enabled or disabled. This is used by command line tools that require access to properties but cannot access the database. Property name : curam.disable.dynamic.properties

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kDeprecationReporting

static final java.lang.String kDeprecationReporting
Indicates if deprecation reporting should be enabled or disabled. This is used by all tools (both online and offline) that report deprecation warnings to the user (e.g. rules and workflow validation). Property name : curam.deprecation.reporting

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kEntityStructDeprecation

static final java.lang.String kEntityStructDeprecation
Indicates if generated entity standard structs should be deprecated if an entity is deprecated. This is used by generators which generate standard entity structs. Property name : curam.entity.struct.deprecation

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kRoundingPrecision

static final java.lang.String kRoundingPrecision
Indicates if when rounding money types in Curam, the HALF_UP algorithm will be used. This means that all Money will be rounded up. If set to true, the HALF_UP algorithm will be used. If not set, a default of true is used. Property name : curam.environment.roundingprecision.enable

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kMaxOpenTabs

static final java.lang.String kMaxOpenTabs
Defines the maximum number of tabs that are allowed to be open in an application. If this value is set to zero, there is no limit on the number of tabs that can be opened in an application. Property name : curam.environment.max.open.tabs

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kdisplayTimeoutWarningDialog

static final java.lang.String kdisplayTimeoutWarningDialog
Indicates that the timout warning modal dialog should be displayed to the user before the current session is expires. This modal dialog is disabled by default. Property name : curam.environment.enable.timeout.warning.modal

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kTimeoutWarningDialogTimePeriod

static final java.lang.String kTimeoutWarningDialogTimePeriod
Configures the period of time in seconds that a user has to respond to a timeout warning dialog before the the current session is expires. The default time period is 120 seconds. Property name : curam.environment.timeout.warning.modal.time

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kTimeoutWarningDialogLogoutPage

static final java.lang.String kTimeoutWarningDialogLogoutPage
Configures the logout page identifier associated with a Quit button within the timeout warning dialog. The default logout page identifier is LoginWrapper. Property name : curam.environment.timeout.warning.modal.logoutpage

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kFallbackDefaultLocale

static final java.lang.String kFallbackDefaultLocale
Default: en. The fallback locale to be used for message files and codetables whereby no entry is found for the current users locale. Property name : curam.environment.fallback.default.locale

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kGuardAgainstLeavingApp

static final java.lang.String kGuardAgainstLeavingApp
Indicates whether warnings messages are enabled or disabled when the user leaves or refreshes an external application. These warnings are disabled by default. Property name : curam.external.app.guard.against.leaving

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kDefaultLocale

static final java.lang.String kDefaultLocale
Default: en. The default value of the language code for the server. Property name : curam.environment.default.locale

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kRecordLockedSystemException

static final java.lang.String kRecordLockedSystemException
Specifies whether a RecordLockedException should be set to a System exception. The default is false here, that it is a Application exception. Property name : curam.environment.recordlocked.systemexception

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kReadmultiMaxSystemException

static final java.lang.String kReadmultiMaxSystemException
Specifies whether a ReadmultiMaxException should be set to a System exception. The default is false here, that it is a Application exception. Property name : curam.environment.readmultimax.systemexception

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kTransactionSQLQueryCacheDisabled

static final java.lang.String kTransactionSQLQueryCacheDisabled
Specifies whether any SQL queries that do a SELECT on a database table will have their results cached for the duration of the transaction in which the operation was invoked. Subsequent calls using the same SQL query will then retrieve the results from this thread local transaction SQL query cache and not read the results from the database. The default setting for disabling this cache is false so that the results of SQL queries will be cached. Property name : curam.transaction.sqlquerycache.disabled

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kTransactionSQLQueryCacheLobMaximumSize

static final java.lang.String kTransactionSQLQueryCacheLobMaximumSize
Specifies the maximum size of a field of type CLOB or type BLOB in a result set that is allowed to be cached in the transaction SQL query cache. Property name : curam.sqlquerycache.lob.max.size

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kEnableLoggingClientAuthCheck

static final java.lang.String kEnableLoggingClientAuthCheck
Default: false. When set to true, all client authorization checks will be logged to the AuthorisationLog database table. Property name : curam.enable.logging.client.authcheck

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kAuditTrailDataCompressionThreshold

static final java.lang.String kAuditTrailDataCompressionThreshold
Specifies the size of the audit data stored in the detailinfo column of the audittrail database table that causes data compression to be invoked. Default: -1 (off). This value is checked per audit operation. To turn compression on for all audittrail detailinfo data set this value to 0. When turned on rows that contain compressed data have the boolean attribute ISCOMPRESSED set to true. Note that short audit data is not likely to see performance gains, but will for large data rows. The performance of Curam auditing OOTB should not require compression, but if you add additional auditing you should evaluate your auditing selections for performance to determine the best setting for this value. Compression is done via the curam.util.resources.ByteArrayUtil.byteArrayToBase64EncodedString method and decompression can be done via the corresponding ByteArrayUtil.base64EncodedStringToByteArray method. Property name : curam.audit.audittrail.datacompressionthreshold

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kMessageEnableCodeTableError

static final java.lang.String kMessageEnableCodeTableError
Default: false. When set to true, an error is thrown if a code table code that does not exist is passed to the MessageUtil class when constructing a message that contains a code table. Property name : curam.message.enable.codetable.error

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kSystemPropertyProjectName

static final java.lang.String kSystemPropertyProjectName
This parameter is required by the Rules and Workflow engines to dynamically invoke methods in the application. Property name : curam.project.name

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kDisableTabCaching

static final java.lang.String kDisableTabCaching
Default: false. Indicates if tab caching should be disabled. Note, this only applies to caching on the server side. Property name : curam.disable.tab.cache

See Also:
Constant Field Values
